website_summaries.verdict: A highly-rated pack featuring a bulk supply of glow sticks alongside handy finger lights.
pros: Includes 100 glow sticks and 40 LED finger lights
LED rings can be switched on and off
Comes with connectors to make necklaces and bracelets
cons: Some finger lights arrived as duds
Some finger lights did not last as long as the glow sticks

customer_reviews.title: That's how many didn't work. *UPDATED*
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely hit and miss. Out of 100, probably around 25 didn't work. I try not to complain too much because these were cheap, but expected a few more to work than did. The ones that did work, worked great and kids loved them. Just expect 75% of them to work. *UPDATE* I was contacted by the seller shortly after this review. I will say they went above and beyond to fix the matter and you can DEFINITELY buy with assurance that if you have any dissatisfaction, they WILL address it, promptly. As such, my original 3 Star review has been bumped to 5 due to outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great success !
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our candle vigil for our family reunion instead of candles because the facility does not allow candles unless they are in vases . It's part of our family ceremony honoring my grandmother and her children, my mother and her siblings. "The Descendants of _______________Family Reunion." Candles are used for each, but every one got a finger light and we used the blue and white lights alternating colors at the tables. It was beautiful when the lights were turned low to soft jazz music as we honored them. We will use these again. In 2017 we used glow bracelets which were a success as well.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Putting together birthday gift bags is hard and I always have trouble deciding what to put in the bags that are kids friendly. I decided to buy the LED light party for kids and they absolutely love them! They were very creative with the lights and some would ask for the left over gift bags to get more LED light party. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults love these.
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit for not only the kids but the adults too. The kids with them on the fingers we turned off the lights and they made the lights dance on the walls and ceilings. Many of the adults wanted to try them on to and as the sun went down the kids had a good time running in the backyard with these pretending to be fireflies. The only downside is some of them didn't work and a few broke quite easily. But with so many in the pack there were more than enough for everybody to get replacement ones.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for adults and teens.  Not for children under 10 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: The adults and children loved these lights. That being said, I do not think they are safe for children under 10. The plastic top comes off easily as does the rubber band that hold this on your finger. The company contacted me regarding my review and the customer service has been good. We like these and are keeping them for the adults and older children to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Alex &.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: These were bright and beautiful. One of the lasers accidentally got left on and it’s 12 hours later and it’s still going. My granddaughter thoroughly enjoyed her glow party and these made it a shit!
customer_reviews.author: Intelligent free thinker

customer_reviews.title: Looking for something better.
customer_reviews.text: There is a tiny cap on the end that comes off easily and keeps the whole thing together. Tough for kids and adults to keep together. Update. The company was very accomodating and offered a refund and to send me a new package. While I didn't take the refund I did take the opportunity to see if my lights had been defective. It was not. The picture I have attached here to took me less than 20 seconds to disassemble. These are really only usable by people from the age of 20 to 50. Any younger or older and they fall apart. And then you're left with little parts in the yard and on the porch and in the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update: Customer care contacted me regarding my defective product. They helped resovle the issue by refunding me as well as replacing with like product. They followed up with me to let me know what and where the process was to make sure I was satisfied. Great job. Not all worked. But for the price cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction matters and kids loved these
customer_reviews.text: *updated review, I was contacted by the company and given a replacement set even though I had not asked for it to be replaced they were very easy to work with and seemed genuinely concerned with my satisfaction and their product. I would definitely order from them again. * (Original review) Many of the finger lights didn't work and had corroded batteries but we still had enough for the party and the kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween Giveaway!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a neighborhood that gets a huge amount of trick-or-treat traffic on Halloween. So much traffic that my candy bill can easily approach $100 - no kidding! These LED finger lights are a great alternative to handing out candy and far more economical. Compare these at 18 cents each to 35 cents for a piece of candy (from a 2lb/56 piece bag of Palmer Halloween mix), it's a no brainer and much better for dental health. These come neatly packaged in a 4 section tray with 25 of each color per section. I tried one of each color and they worked great, very bright and easy to operate. I can't wait to see what the kids think!
customer_reviews.author: arielmt

customer_reviews.title: FALLS APART EASY
customer_reviews.text: This was the scariest experience that I have had on a product. I bought them to give to the Halloween to give out with the candy, but as I was pulling them out, they began to fall apart. Batteries going one way and the small metal springs the other. I thought that I would try and salvage the good ones but the front cap is loose on al of them and once it comes off the whole thing falls apart. I am sorry for the bad review, but hope that next year the problem is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: fun for parties
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun! I got these to wear to a black light party for Halloween and they didn't disappoint. My only quibble is that the finger lights have an elastic section that would occasionally slip off, so I'd recommend bringing an extra. But they definitely did the job and made me light up! I had no issues with the bracelets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: They fit our party them perfect. Still have a few left that we will ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a Glow Themed Halloween party. They were a hit. Handed them out a the door. The party lasted 4 hours and people were still glowing as they left. My son's finger glow still had a twinkle the next morning! They fit our party them perfect. Still have a few left that we will wear tomorrow (Halloween) as we trick or treat in the darkness.
customer_reviews.author: LBarker

customer_reviews.title: Many kids loved them and asked to have them and the candy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my teal pumpkin treat for tricker treating. I had them side by side with the candy- in case kids with allergies or with parents ;) who don't want them to have more candy! Many kids loved them and asked to have them and the candy! I'm very happy with the response of all the kids that wanted them. Especially those with the allergies! Great colors and fun glow
customer_reviews.author: HANNNNIE

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought 40 to be sure that I would have at least 30 lights that worked. It would have been great to think all would work, but that's not the case. After making sure both sides were pressed together, there were still 9 that didn't work, and one of those didn't even have a switch attached. For the ones that did work, the lights are bright and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It’s kid crack.
customer_reviews.text: They keep coming back for more so you need the whole pack. 3yo to 10yo and adults too, always dig these. The most important thing: keep those connectors to make the bracelets in YOUR pocket and only give 1-2 connectors per kid. If not... Every. Single. Time: one kid takes them all, uses 2, and then loses the whole bag of tiny clear plastic in a bush so that the rest of the children will terrorize you because it’s all your fault that this glow stick does not become a bracelet on demand. But it’s complete magic when they do. So take it from me.
customer_reviews.author: JK in NC

customer_reviews.title: A must have product for birthday parties!
customer_reviews.text: Putting together birthday gift bags is hard and I always have trouble deciding what to put in the bags that are kids friendly. I decided to buy the LED light party for kids and they absolutely love them! They were very creative with the lights and some would ask for the left over gift bags to get more LED light party. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween Trick or Treating
customer_reviews.text: I remember as a kid always loving the things I got during Halloween that lit up (especially glow sticks). With leds (which weren’t around when I was a kid), it seemed to be the most popular thing I was giving out at Halloween. Every kid wanted one of the led rings once I mixed them in with the candy. I wish I had bought more so this year (2019), I bought a whole bunch. Easy thing to make a kids night on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stephens

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service
customer_reviews.text: We got a pack of these for a birthday party. 40 finger lights, so each of the 4 kids would get 10 lights each, one for each finger. fantastic! Upon receiving the package, we tested each light. Unfortunately 4 of them did not work. We contacted the company about getting replacements for the 4 non-working lights, and they corrected the defective lights by sending an entirely new package. The glow sticks and lights were a hit for the "glow party". Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ward

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BUTTON BATTERIES, NOT FOR CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: NOT RECOMMENDED FOR CHILDREN! Product does list “small parts”, and my little ones do not consume small parts (3 and under); but take great caution if ordering. Purchased for Halloween favors. These are cheaply designed and break very easily. SMALL PARTS, and they are all a hazard. Contains three small button batteries per light. Lights are bright and virbrant. Small rubber finger attachment slips off easily, tight for larger fingers. Kids loved them, but I ended up throwing them all away by day three after they kept breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Out of 100 about 8 failed, a couple completely and others would flicker a bit then go out. The ones that work are bright. They are super tiny, and as far as attaching to fingers it’s just a little rubber band that holds the tiny flashlight on the finger. It works but you’ve got a chunky plastic object sitting on your finger. The rubber band can also pop off so definitely not appropriate for the littlest ones. Good value though, even at that fail level, given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Glow Party
customer_reviews.text: Planning a glow party for my teen. These are great. Arrived yesterday. Tested one to make sure it will work and it’s got a bright glow, cute colors and easy to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Marla J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween handout
customer_reviews.text: For kids who didn't want or couldn't have candy, we gave out these light-up rings. They were a hit! The kids absolutely loved them. Only "downside" to these is that they only last about 12 hours (so they just end up in the trash after a few days), and for the littlest kids, they couldn't turn on the lights themselves. Otherwise, it was worth getting these simply for the joy on the faces of the kids.
customer_reviews.author: E Bird

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Halloween to hand out to the little kids. The lights are turned on with a little switch, and a rubber band goes over their finger to hold it in place. The kids absolutely loved them! In fact, a few turned away without getting their candy!! I would have given 5 stars, but the rubber band is a little tight and will start to "numb" your finger in about 5-10 minutes. Nothing a little stretching of the band won't fix, or switching fingers like we did. I can't wait to order more for next Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when I opened this pack of lights to read with flashlights for Dr. Seuss day with my 2nd graders. we discovered 23 lights that didn't work or fell apart when student tried to put them on. Good thing there were 100 lights, but with one quarter not working, I would never buy from this company again. UPDATE: Great Customer Service! The company reached out to me and is going above and beyond to help me create a different fun day for students. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title and NOT  as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After posting my dissatisfaction of the product the seller contacted me by email. They agreed to a send the product as described and update a better description. Hope for improved service for future customers Thank you Rip off. This title says glow stick finger lights 140. What it should say is 100 cheap glow sticks and 40 finger lights. Deceiving listing and total wrong marketing. Not happy about this company listing. No time now to return and find something else for Saturday. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Short

customer_reviews.title: Glow sticks and 40 finger light: 8 duds out of 40 (100 finger lights perfect)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't try the glow sticks but they looked fine and there's usually not a problem if they're packaged well, which these were. Out of the 40 finger lights 8 were duds. I thought that was a high percentage, hence the 4 stars. I was able to supplement with another pack to get enough good ones for 50 kids. Not sure why but this review was copied to the 100 finger lights. Different purchase, shipped together. The 100 finger lights were bright and every one worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: dd3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a party
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received the product, I checked all of the 'finger lights' and all but three of them worked. As other reviews have mentioned, the lights can be a pain to put on and keep on. The plastic band that goes around your finger will sometimes separate from the light if you're not careful. The glow sticks themselves seem to work as well as you'd expect...I haven't gone through all of them, but I did encounter one or two duds so far. Still, you get a variety of colors and they seem to last through the night.
customer_reviews.author: EditableSpline

customer_reviews.title: Finger Lights were a pleasant surprise, Glow sticks worked well.
customer_reviews.text: So as finger lights they are a convenient way to see at night in a party environment. At the music festival we went to, the neighbors invited us to join their "Hippie Web" so, our little take on it (pictured) used the fingerlights at intersections, It lit the web up so cool, it looked like lasers. They don't hold their brightness for long, which is a good thing in this application. they do however hold on to a nice light from dusk till dawn.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rutan

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy fixing your kids finger lights every 5 minutes...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product, I bought similar ones last year that were same price but had a different band that actually stayed on. The bands dont stay on these and you will find yourself having to stop what your doing 20 times to help your kid fix it. Also the switches are poor quality and jam because of the play they allow on the switch slot....
customer_reviews.author: Aquix

customer_reviews.title: 2 words: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Here's a simple question if over half the rings 27/40 don't work and 43/100 glowsticks have already been "used", how can you expect anyone to recommend this to anyone? Even if the remaining ones were fine? Nice concept, but poor execution. Do yourself a favor and buy the pieces separately in case you need to return either one of both. Hope this review helped. Cheers!!
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: Super bright long lasting batteries
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for Halloween, the kids loved playing with them and they were easily seen by cars at night. The batteries last a long time
customer_reviews.author: alext2280

customer_reviews.title: Fun little lights!
customer_reviews.text: 93 out of 100 worked, that's why I give 4 stars and not 5. Bought them to give out on Halloween and they were a hit! I left one on in my car and it lasted 24 hours before it died completely. Lots of fun for the kids. Button batteries are not super secure, use caution around toddlers and young children.
customer_reviews.author: C-squared

customer_reviews.title: The finger lights are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: While the glow bracelets were nice and useful, the kids LOVED the finger tip lights. Next time we will be ordering just those. Lots and lots of those. Even though, right out of the box about 10% didnt work we eventually managed to get all but 1 to light up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Handed these out for trick or treat the last two years and they are a huge hit!! Great option for kids with allergies who can't have certain candy. I keep them in a separate bowl so they don't touch food items. They are great quality too. I only had one that didn't light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for trick or treaters
customer_reviews.text: Love these finger lights to give out in lieu of candy for trick or treats. I have been giving these out in treat bags for several years and they're great for the kids safety. It's a lot of fun to see them running all through the neighborhood with these lights!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Okay product for the price.  Kids like them.
customer_reviews.text: The kids really like these lights, and since the come in 4 colors, I have kids working to earn more. Before the kids take one, I have them test it. A few don't work well at all. Another problem they have is that the rubber band that the finger goes into keeps slipping out and off the light. A piece of tape helps keep that rubber band from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when putting on you finger.
customer_reviews.text: The band on finger lights broke on several of them The lights are nice and bright. Price is great. My friends loved them
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ricci Gilette

customer_reviews.title: Decent except some didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Halloween and also for birthday favors- but didn’t read reviews. Many of mine didn’t work (assume batteries dead) and I agree with other commenters here that the front cap comes off too easily. However it works without that front cap. Still got a lot of use lighting up my outdoor Halloween decorations.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good value even with a few not working
customer_reviews.text: Fun handout for trick-or-treaters. Kids loved the light and definitely made a difference on the rainy Holloween night this year for visibility. Perfect to fit on a kid’s finger. Three arrived with dead batteries. One switch would not work. One elastic broke. Still- I will buy this again next year. Handed out every single one!
customer_reviews.author: Bermuda sun

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: The rubber band that you use to put these on your finger with detach from the light constantly. It’s pointless to try and wear them. And, 20% of the lights don’t even work. They’re cheap, but I needed all of them to work so now they’re completely worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: A hit for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: We're a teal pumpkin family and gave these out for Halloween. They were a huge hit! Even the adults came up to ask for some. We only went through half, so I can't tell you if they all worked, but the 50 we gave away were 50/50. The red is a bit duller than the rest, but I'm overall pretty happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: balletofangels

customer_reviews.title: cute Halloween hand out
customer_reviews.text: a few came broken, and you have to attach the little rubber band to the lights and while doing that several broke. A couple of the on/off switches broke too. But the ones that worked (most of them) were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: skincare junkster

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA, GREAT LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY problem with these, is the rubber band used to attach them, comes off the light. The quality of the light itself is superb, even has an on/off switch! The kids loved them, but were disappointed when the lights fell off and were almost impossible to wear without losing. :(
customer_reviews.author: ABSBIRD

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the "treasure box" in my sons's classroom. They only needed half so we kept the other half. Good thing there were 50 because I think 8 of them were broken in the 2 hours. They are pretty fragile and once they come apart, forget repairing it. Still, they are pretty cheap, the lights are nice and bright, and the kids are more than entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Get them if they still exist instead of halloween candy
customer_reviews.text: OK it's might kill very small children who eat the batteries but all but the most obese children chose this item over candy on halloween. The lights worked well (except maybe 10). I though it was a great trick or treat item.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Marxen

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: These are really nifty! Slip one onto a finger using the included elastic band, switch it on and light up wherever you point. Fun for making swirling lights by waving your finger. Lasts all night long. So comfortable I forgot I had it on and washed my hands but it still shone brightly.
customer_reviews.author: 808land

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love it easy to use and very durable. Kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: Lisa godinez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely not impressed with these. They're made very cheap. The rubber bands that go around your finger break easy. I ordered two boxes and I would say two handfuls did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Great party toys
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package with 100 light up party sticks and 40 finger laser lights. Good quality and the kids are gonna be so excited. The finger laser lights are good quality and I kept some for myself to play with. Of course when I'm playing with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Buy with Caution! Pro and Con
customer_reviews.text: CON: I got these for goody bags and I recieved 9 that were either broken or wouldn't even turn on :( PRO: The ones that did work were REALLY bright and each child wore them. Even some parents wanted some :)
customer_reviews.author: Edith Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fun & great value
customer_reviews.text: Gave away for kids we volunteer with. They enjoyed...very fun!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised all the lights weren't all white. It maybe my reading skills. I was disappointed some of the lights didn't even last during an hour walk
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: they LOVE playing with lights
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit clunky, but my grandchildren don't care, they LOVE playing with lights, and the cats are very interested also. Just a fun little thing to do for a party, or Halloween, or just for fun any evening.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Freer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality - Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: OMG these Finger Lights are pretty awesome. We got them for our school winter dance and the quality is AMAZING. We have won finger lights at different carnivals, etc. but the bands were super thin and not well attached and the whole thing flimsy - NOT the case with these. I will be PROUD to have these at our winter dance party!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scherber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: I handed these out to my friends’ kids at Halloween. They especially loved the ring lights. A few didn’t work when I handed them out but I just gave them another one, which is why I gave four stars. The ones that did work were extremely bright and the kids loved them. The glow sticks were bright and easy to connect. You could put several together to make different things like necklaces and belts.
customer_reviews.author: Kirien Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and really inexpensive for the quantity of items. We handed these out for Halloween and the kids loved them. The finger lights were great. Before we handed them out I went through each one and made sure they worked. I only found 7 ( out of 80, I ordered 2 sets) of the finger lights were not working. The Light sticks were great, only had 2 that were bad. Not bad numbers considering the price, delivered. I will definitely buy again from here. They have great follow-up after sale. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James r Checo

customer_reviews.title: Very bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Even though they are disposable, they are very bright lights. Out of 100, 2 did not work and none fell apart. Handed them out with candies for Halloween. Also used some to add up lighting to my plants and Halloween displays. Worked great and I will order more of these lights.
customer_reviews.author: irish eyes

customer_reviews.title: Fun Novelty Item
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our pep club for a basketball game. They were fun novelty items. Students loved them. They are inexpensive and serve their purpose but are definitely a one time use item. They serve their purpose if you’re looking for an inexpensive fun way to light up an event.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kid's Halloween party. Much cheaper than buying from the store and the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing and will return
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my five-year-old grandson it comes with no instructions the pieces do not snap together. I Don’t like them and want to return them. So I am going to request a return label. They are not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Mosaic Melody

customer_reviews.title: SparklesNY
customer_reviews.text: This item served its purpose to illuminate while kids dance at my sons party. Some of them did not work or broke apart as we tried using them, but I only needed 50 and those were perfect. At least 11 of them were damaged, but it did not ruin the moment. Thank you for fast shipment/delivery that never disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: These were a hit at my grand daughters glow in ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at my grand daughters glow in the dark skating party. I think the adults were more excited than the kids with these. The lights last for weeks after the party. They shine so bright! We actually used one in each room during a really lengthy power...
customer_reviews.author: Cinbad

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't glow.
customer_reviews.text: Edited: We had an issue with our original order, but the company was very quick to contact me and make the situation right. The product itself is good. The glowsticks were great and worked well, but the finger lights were a bit touchy and break easily. Be careful, those batteries are really dangerous around young children.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Light is bright
customer_reviews.text: Light up rings okay. Light on rings are bright, but I don't like the rubber band that holds around your finger keeping the light on. Its tight for little kids to wear for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely short battery life!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is horrible. The first two finger lights lasted only 5-10 minutes. I bought these for a party in 2 days. I’m afraid the other ones are going to be just as bad. If the batteries lasted longer, I’d give this product 5 stars. But given the short battery life, one star. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for trick-or-treating!
customer_reviews.text: These were great! We handed these out on Halloween and the kids love them! We get a ton of kids every Halloween and these were inexpensive and were also great for making the kids more visible while trick-or-treating! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen b.

customer_reviews.title: Finger Lights
customer_reviews.text: These finger lights were just okay. Out of 100, about 10 were defective or had popped bands. Definitely not for 12/13 year olds. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bmissgina

customer_reviews.title: 1/4 of the Lights Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit upset. Out of 100 lights, 74 work. 26 lights don't work. That's kind of annoying. The picture shows all the lights that don't work. Oh, well, they were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not high quality, but the kids loved them on Halloween. They were bright and easy to hand out. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mmonger

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I love having flashy gadgets to workout ...
customer_reviews.text: I cycle and walk run at nights. So I put these on my fingers. Love it, I love having flashy gadgets to workout with at night.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could do no stars I would. Bought these for a huge school event. Upon handing them out we discovered almost half didn’t work, many others died within an hour. Couldn’t return as we had handed them out so didn’t have all to return
customer_reviews.author: Mamatimesthree

customer_reviews.title: 25% of lights don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Very upset, 25% of light don’t work or arrived broken. Need for an upcoming Halloween party for my kids or else would return and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: EG1192

customer_reviews.title: these rings put out a great light
customer_reviews.text: we wore these rings on our fingers and our shoes. It was amazing how quickly they all got used up. They put out great light and easily lasted the length of the parade.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These rings give a bright light. The elastic stretches to fit any size finger. They are well made. A good value for the price. We will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea K. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price but if you want quality go elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. Bought them to give away at halloween. For the price you can't beat them. But they break very easily, pretty much after you try to take it off your finger. Lights are bright but the body won't hold up to even see how long they will last. Plastic is cheap and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: A dozen broken right out of the box. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: 12 out of 100 are broken. That’s over 10% of product unusable. The value is good until the amount of usable product is taken into account, then it’s not so good. I fear returning because the next set may have more broken. I wish they could just send me a dozen that actually work. I will just have to return and perhaps find something a little more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Amos

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They won't stay put together and half of them didn't work. The company sent a new replacement box which is better although the way you put them together is still clunky and doesn't work as well as some of the others I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: RM WHite

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved these!
customer_reviews.text: They were really inexpensive. A couple of them didn't work, but most worked well. For the price, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bright, great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: As a follow-up, the company reached out to me and offered to replace the few broken lights Very pleased with their customer support. I would purchase from them again. I purchased these to hand out for Halloween. They are much brighter than I was expecting. Out of 100, about 10 don't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A Souza

customer_reviews.title: Fun lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Halloween. There were a few that didn’t work. But the kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: Jacee

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Long-Lasting.
customer_reviews.text: These glowed brightly when activated and did so throughout the night. We had a few left-over and forgot about them until a year later and one or two of them still glowed (faintly) when activated. To be clear, don't save them; use them right away because they are not intended to be stored for very long, but it is remarkable that any did so after a year!
customer_reviews.author: 808land

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids party goody bags.
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this party favors in their goody bags! They were inexpensive for 100 lights and each kid got 3. A couple of them didn't work and a could others just had to pressed right to work, but all in all they were a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dbvj

customer_reviews.title: Good Package Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good set. You get all the glow stick together with the finger lights. The glow sticks come with the connectors to hook them together. The finger lights are pretty cool and bright but not all of them worked which was the reason I left off a star. All in All, the kids seem to like them a good bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was wanting! Kids absolutely loved them! Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: They play with the finger lights for hours with their friends doing different tricks and patterns in the air to make a cool light show
customer_reviews.text: MY kids never get enough of these. They play with the finger lights for hours with their friends doing different tricks and patterns in the air to make a cool light show. Glow sticks are fun to make different designs and see who can make a bigger necklace. The lights are nice and bright. Work in the daylight but look so much better with the lights off for the full effect.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Product is as promised. I'm excited to give them out in lieu of candy on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: theryssa gossman

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these from a different company and those were far superior to what we received. Many of the lights, especially the red ones, did not work at all. The straps that hold the lights onto the finger were thin and broke very easily. I tried to save some money and ended up with inferior quality. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: PHQ173

customer_reviews.title: Finger lights
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these lights. They are playing with them all day long. The lights are nice and bright. They have a long lasting battery got left on overnight, were just as bright the next day when they found them again. They are very durable for children's use of being dropped and thrown occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four boxes for Halloween ( 2 boxes for myself and 2 for family members) to give with candy. 35-40% of the rings did not work, how disappointing!! Yes, they were $18 for 100 but still not worth wasting your money!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: All but 4 of the 100 lights worked perfectly. Handing them out for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy F.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Cool idea. Kids loved them for my giveaway at the racetrack but they didn't seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: Glow Bracelets were great with bright long lasting glow. Some of the light up rings weren't working, the ones that did were bright and super awesome. The company reached out, gave me a Full refund and offered a new set of products. Prompt customer service. I will be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel

customer_reviews.title: Durable and bright
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I received these because of how heavy the box was. These are made out of durable plastic which I like because I don’t have to worry the kids might break it open. Colors are super bright too.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These LED rings are super easy to put on and wear. My kids and I are having so much fun with these! They are, dare I say, better than glowsticks!
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: These are going to be tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got these today and of course had to try them out. My 6 year old daughter and I had a blast! I cant wait to give these out to the kids at her school for Valentines day with a card that says "you light up my life" lol. These are going to be tons of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Some didnt work and others had low light than others the same color
customer_reviews.author: Force Animations

customer_reviews.title: Fun treats
customer_reviews.text: I used these instead of candy for Halloween treats and the trick-or-treaters seemed to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grandbabies and for my future Easter Egg Hunt. We love them. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service contacted me and issued me a refund and are sending more. Great customer service! These are very delicate and break super easily. My son played with one for about 5 minutes and it broke. He's 7.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: 140pk Glow Sticks and LED Finger Lights - Glow in the Dark Party Favors Pack with 100 Glow Sticks, 100 Connectors, and 40 Light Up Rings
feature_bullets: BULK GLOW PARTY SUPPLIES FOR KIDS: 140 glow pack includes 100 pieces of 8-inch long glowsticks, 100 connectors to make necklaces or bracelets, and 40 LED finger lights
SAFE, DURABLE NEON PARTY ACCESSORIES: Assorted glow sticks for kids and adults are nontoxic and waterproof; finger lights fit comfortably and are made in durable plastic
LONG LASTING GLOW TOYS: These 8-inch long multi-color glowsticks shine bright for 10-14 hours; light up finger ring accessories include pre-installed batteries and on/off switches
QUALITY ASSURED: We’ll provide a full refund if you’re not satisfied with your mega pack of LED finger lights, glow sticks and connectors
INFINITE GLOW IN THE DARK FUN: Use glow sticks and light up toys for birthdays, decorations, pool parties, carnivals, raves, concerts, celebrations, weddings, campings, black light parties, and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars333 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
